comments:
I20070208-2030

- check out org.eclipse.core.expressions from CVS
- select project in Package Explorer
- Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V

Error in the log is below. Note that the error message is also suboptimal: It should enclose the project name in 'single quotes'

Project Copy of org.eclipse.core.expressions does not contain CVS folder meta-information

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException: Project Copy of org.eclipse.core.expressions does not contain CVS folder meta-information
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.setProject(CVSTeamProvider.java:173)
at org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.mapNewProvider(RepositoryProvider.java:207)
at org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.mapExistingProvider(RepositoryProvider.java:236)
at org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.getProvider(RepositoryProvider.java:462)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.TeamHookDispatcher.getProvider(TeamHookDispatcher.java:97)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.TeamHookDispatcher.getRuleFactory(TeamHookDispatcher.java:105)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Rules.factoryFor(Rules.java:92)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Rules.copyRule(Rules.java:61)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.copy(Resource.java:481)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.internalCopy(Project.java:583)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.copy(Project.java:198)
at org.eclipse.ui.ide.undo.CopyProjectOperation.copyProject(CopyProjectOperation.java:246)
at org.eclipse.ui.ide.undo.CopyProjectOperation.doExecute(CopyProjectOperation.java:130)
at org.eclipse.ui.ide.undo.AbstractWorkspaceOperation$1.run(AbstractWorkspaceOperation.java:210)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1798)
at org.eclipse.ui.ide.undo.AbstractWorkspaceOperation.execute(AbstractWorkspaceOperation.java:208)
at org.eclipse.core.commands.operations.DefaultOperationHistory.execute(DefaultOperationHistory.java:509)
at org.eclipse.ui.actions.CopyProjectOperation$1.run(CopyProjectOperation.java:163)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
*** Bug 173610 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

We had code that would check to see if the project has CVS folders when it gets mapped to CVS. However, on a project copy, the act of getting a copyRule causes the project to be mapped before the CVS folder has been created. I've removed the code that logs since it also cause bug 173610.

traces.message: Project Copy of org.eclipse.core.expressions does not contain CVS folder meta-information
